title: These companies are rewarding shareholders in a major way
itunes:title: These companies are rewarding shareholders in a major way
description: Hey guys—Frank is traveling today, so I (Daniel) am taking the reins. [0:15] Pfizer (PFE) announced positive news about its vaccine booster shots. I share my take… and why the current macro picture makes Pfizer a good buy. [2:08] Mike Novagratz, CEO of Galaxy Digital, spoke with CNBC about what to expect from institutional buyers in the crypto space… and it’s great news for the asset class. He also explained why ethereum could outperform bitcoin as inflation moves higher… [7:40] Finally, I highlight my method for finding quality stocks… and a few catching my attention for rewarding shareholders in a big way... [14:55] Enjoyed this episode? Get Wall Street Unplugged delivered FREE to your inbox every Wednesday: https://www.curzioresearch.com/wall-street-unplugged/   Wall Street Unplugged podcast is available at: --: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/wall-street-unplugged-frank/ -- : https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/curzio-research/wall-street-unplugged-2 -- : https://www.curzioresearch.com/category/podcast/wall-street-unplugged/   : https://twitter.com/frankcurzio :. https://www.facebook.com/CurzioResearch/ : https://www.linkedin.com/in/frank-curzio-690561a7/ : https://www.curzioresearch.com
